name: Djmagtop100
tagline: The results of all the djmag top 100 djs competitions
body:
### DJmag top 100 DJs

The results of all the DJmag top 100 DJs competitions from 1997 until today.

  * [Live running version](https://djmagtop100.herokuapp.com/)
  
## History

The DJmag top 100 poll was instituted in 1991.
Back then it was just an alphabetical list of the best 100 DJ's.
In the year 1997 it became a ranking for all the DJ's in the world.
The results before 1997 are not included because not all of the information is presently available.

## API

The following routes are available:

```
GET /years/:year
```

The ranking of the specific year.

```
GET /artists/:artist
```

The ranking of the artist through the years.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
